entry.title: Setup the blog
entry.summary:
This blog is hosted by GitHub Pages Using Pelican.

pelican C:/githubBlog/blogPelican/content -o C:/githubBlog/blogPelican/output -s C:\githubBlog/blogPelican/pelicanconf.py

cd C:/githubBlog/blogPelican/output

python -m pelican.server

publish to the GitHub (didn't work on me)

git init
git remote add origin https://github.com/lanfa/lanfa.github.io.git
git remote rm origin
git add --all
git commit -m "commit message"
git push origin master
